sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Trophy, Users, Calendar, TrendingUp, Plus, Eye, Edit, Award } from 'lucide-react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { tournamentService, teamService } from '../services'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner'; import { formatDate, getStatusColor } from '../utils/helpers'; const DashboardPage = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); // Fetch user's tournaments (if organizer/admin) or registered teams const { data: tournaments, isLoading: tournamentsLoading } = useQuery( 'user-tournaments', () => tournamentService.getAllTournaments({ page: 1, size: 5 }), { staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000 } ); const isOrganizerOrAdmin = user?.role === 'ADMIN' || user?.role === 'ORGANIZER'; const stats = [ { name: 'Active Tournaments', value: tournaments?.data?.totalElements || 0, icon: Trophy, color: 'text-sports-orange', bgColor: 'bg-orange-100', }, { name: 'Registered Teams', value: '12', icon: Users, color: 'text-sports-green', bgColor: 'bg-green-100', }, { name: 'Matches Played', value: '45', icon: Calendar, color: 'text-sports-purple', bgColor: 'bg-purple-100', }, { name: 'Win Rate', value: '78%', icon: TrendingUp, color: 'text-sports-pink', bgColor: 'bg-pink-100', }, ]; return (
{/* Welcome Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.name || user?.email}!

Here's what's happening with your tournaments and teams.

{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat) => (

{stat.name}

{stat.value}

))}
{/* Recent Tournaments */}

{isOrganizerOrAdmin ? 'Your Tournaments' : 'Recent Tournaments'}

{isOrganizerOrAdmin && ( Create )} View All
{tournamentsLoading ? ( ) : tournaments?.data?.content?.length === 0 ? (

No tournaments found

{isOrganizerOrAdmin && ( Create Your First Tournament )}
) : (
{tournaments?.data?.content?.slice(0, 5).map((tournament) => (

{tournament.name}

Start: {formatDate(tournament.startDate)}

{tournament.status}
{isOrganizerOrAdmin && ( )}
))}
)}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

Registered for Spring Championship

2 hours ago

Team "Eagles" updated roster

1 day ago

Won match against "Tigers"

3 days ago

Next match scheduled

1 week ago

View All Activity
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Browse Tournaments

Find and join exciting competitions

{isOrganizerOrAdmin ? (

Create Tournament

Start organizing your own tournament

) : (

Create Team

Form a team and compete

)}

Update Profile

Manage your account settings

); }; export default DashboardPage;
